content:
That's great to hear that you're taking lessons with Alex! Having a good teacher can make a huge difference in your progress. Fingerpicking is a wonderful skill to develop, and it's awesome that Alex is helping you with that.

However, as you've noticed, chord transitions are a crucial aspect of playing the guitar. It's great that you're recognizing the importance of working on this skill. By focusing on chord transitions, you'll be able to play songs more smoothly and confidently.

Remember to communicate with Alex about your concerns and goals. He can likely provide you with personalized tips and exercises tailored to your playing style and needs. It's always helpful to have a teacher's guidance and feedback to ensure you're practicing effectively.

Also, don't be afraid to ask Alex to help you with chord transitions during your lessons. He can provide you with specific exercises, drills, or even songs that can help you improve your transitions.

Keep up the good work, and I'm sure you'll see significant progress with consistent practice and guidance from Alex!
